nodes.title:
New tech CEO daily routine:

5am wake-up but don't eat b/c you're fasting

6-8 listen to 12 podcasts

8-10 generate memes

10-12 troll your enemies on Twitter

12-6 intermittent fasting, answer some emails

6-8 clubhouse

8-10 pump dogecoin & meme stocks
